sentences.sContent: Vegetable melon and fruit appears on the market in great quantities, can promote digestive function, want to notice to maintain to splenetic , prevent the enteron disease that food brings.
sentences.sContent_eng: Vegetable melon and fruit appears on the market in great quantities, can promote digestive function, want to notice to maintain to splenetic , prevent the enteron disease that food brings.
sentences.sCn: 蔬菜瓜果大量上市，能促进消化功能，要注意对脾脏的保养，防止饮食带来的消化道疾病。

synos.tran: 坏心眼的；脾脏的；容易发怒的
